import React, { useState } from 'react' const Payment = (props) => { const [cardDet, setCardDet] = useState({}) const handleChangeEvent = (e, field) => { let fieldValue = e.target.value setCardDet({ ...cardDet, [field]: fieldValue }) } const handleSubmitEvent = e => { e.preventDefault() props.tab(4) } return (
handleChangeEvent(e, 'cardType')} /> visa   handleChangeEvent(e, 'cardType')} /> MasterCard
handleChangeEvent(e, 'cardNumber')} />
handleChangeEvent(e, 'cardName')} />
handleChangeEvent(e, 'cvv')} />
handleChangeEvent(e, 'expiryDate')} />
) } export default Payment;
